item.title: The Adventures of Johnny Bunko - The Last Career Guide You'll Ever Need: Book Review
item.description: I read Dan Pink’s A Whole New Mindearlier in the year but I hadn’t heard of The Adventures of Johnny Bunkountil my colleague Sumeet Moghementioned it in a conversation during ThoughtWorks India’s XConf, an internal conference run here. The book is written in the Mangaformat so it’s incredibly quick to read and it gives 6 ideas around building a career. I’m generally not a fan of the idea of ‘building a career’ - generally when I hear that phrase it involves having a ‘five year’ plan and other such concepts which I consider to be pointless.
